strings: <voice_0x010014CD><se_low>*: There's no difference between night and day down here, but I can still judge the passing of time.
<voice_0x010014CE><se_low>*: Ah, it looks like it's that time again.

<voice_0x010014CF><se_low>*: The guards change shift once a day.
So I can always tell when I'm one day closer
to heaven...

<center>The party was helpless to do anything
<center>but watch time tick slowly by,
<center>imprisoned on Purgatory Island...
